metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: • 2 cups all-purpose flour • 1/2 cup sugar • 1 tablespoon baking powder • 1/2 teaspoon salt • 1 cup milk • 1/4 cup vegetable oil • 1 large egg • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract • 1 cup fresh or frozen berries

• 1 cup all-purpose flour • 2 tablespoons sugar • 1 teaspoon baking powder • 1/2 teaspoon baking soda • 1/4 teaspoon salt • 1 cup buttermilk • 1 large egg • 2 tablespoons melted butter • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
• 2 large eggs • 1/4 cup shredded cheese • 1/4 cup cooked sausage or bacon • 1/4 cup diced bell pepper • 1/4 cup diced onions • 2 small flour tortillas •

 1 pound white fish fillets (such as cod or tilapia)  1/2 cup flour  1/2 cup cornmeal  1 teaspoon paprika  1 teaspoon cumin  1 teaspoon salt  1/2 teaspoon pepper  1/2 cup buttermilk  1/4 cup vegetable oil 

 1 pound pork tenderloin, cubed  1 bell pepper, diced  1 small onion, diced  1/2 cup pineapple chunks  1/4 cup ketchup  1/4 cup rice vinegar  1/4 cup soy sauce  1/4 cup brown sugar  2 tablespoons cornstarch  2 tablespoons vegetable oil 

 1 pound beef sirloin, thinly sliced  2 cups broccoli florets  1 small onion, diced  2 cloves garlic, minced  1/4 cup soy sauce  1/4 cup beef broth  2 tablespoons oyster sauce  1 tablespoon cornstarch  2 tablespoons vegetable oil 
